__e: Sounds like she wasn't who we thought she was.
Yeah, well, he's not the bastard we thought he was.
He... We believed it was a gift from the Gods of Light, but the people of our village called us heretics and condemned us to death.
We believed they were run by a group of Twelve... whose power was everywhere and nowhere. Because no one knew who they were... until now.
Your father and I thought the first time would be the last.
When we thought you were dead, each one of us had to figure out why we were doing all this.
We assumed that it was left behind in the curse, but now we think it might be lost somewhere here in Storybrooke.
And for standing up here and showing all of us that love and marriage is so much bigger than we thought it could be.
We did what we thought was best for her but... but she needs you now.
I guess we didn't know everything we thought we did at 16, huh?
Okay, to all of us doing something
To tell the truth? That we wanted to hear ... because ...? not at that point believed to have opportunity?
That's what made us think that it might be you.
We thought you were doing drugs or something.
I told you, he's got nine lives, this one.
